thread.title: Kate Ayres

author: Kate Ayres
title: Kate Ayres
text:
After spending a year trying to manage pancreatitis and IBS, as well as a range of niggling health problems, in my rescue 10 yr old springer spaniel, trying a range of vet prescribed food, low fat and hypo-allergenic foods and a raw food diet, none of which helped I tried tails.com at the recommendation of a colleague. I have a grain-free, low fat kibble suitable for dogs with pancreatitis.
In less than three months, the change has been amazing. Not only has the 'delicate' bottom situation been resolved, his coat has improved enormously and his levels of energy have shot up. Last week he actually ran - only a few steps but I didn't know he could run!
The delivery option is great and you can bring it forward/ delay it as needed. I only wish I had tried tails.com earlier as it would have saved Buster from months of gastric distress and my purse several hundreds of pounds!
